name: Regexp after word
description: find smiley apearance everywhere except after word "mailto"
content:
htmlText = "Edited - :Denis@game2dev.com\">denis@game2dev.com" Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com! [^(mailto)](:D)$& Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial.
